text: In riꞌ ri qas in ucheꞌal ri uvas, ri nuTat are kachakun ri ulew.15:1 Pa ri Ojer Tyoxalaj Wuj, jacha kubꞌij pa Isaías 5 ri winaq aꞌj Israel kejunumax rukꞌ ri ucheꞌal ri uva. Chi riꞌ kubꞌij chi ri uwach ri uva man utz taj xelik. Pa we jun kꞌulmatajik riꞌ kubꞌij chi we kujkꞌojiꞌ che areꞌ, kaqabꞌan riꞌ ri urayibꞌal ukꞌuꞌx ri Dios.
